# Build results
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.sln.docstates

# Mono auto-generated files
mono_crash.*

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# VS Code settings
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# Rider settings
.idea/

# MacOS system files
.DS_Store

# Logs
*.log

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# Visual Studio files
.vs/
*.vscode/
*.VC.db
*.VC.VC.opendb

# ASP.NET Core Blazor
wwwroot/*.cache
wwwroot/_framework/
wwwroot/css/app.css.map
wwwroot/css/app.css

# Secrets
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Local.json
appsettings.*.json

# Global JetBrains Rider files
.idea/
.idea.*
*.iml

# Generated files
*.generated.cs
ServiceFabricBackup/
